features: Backlit Mouse with 22 Light Modes - Featuring with RGB rainbow light that adds a touch of elegance and style to your workstation. With 22 different color options available, you can easily customize the backlit to suit your mood or working environment. The light can be turned off for energy saving

Multi-Device Bluetooth Mouse - Connect to 3 devices simultaneously via Bluetooth 1, Bluetooth 2, and a 2.4G USB receiver. Seamlessly switch between your computers, laptops with a single click. Enjoy the freedom of multi-device connectivity without the hassle of tangled wires or multiple receivers

Mouse with Built-in Cursor Jiggler - This mouse not only serves as a regular mouse but also features a unique cursor jiggler mode. Activate the jiggler mode to prevent screen timeouts and keeping your device active. Say goodbye to frustrating "away" statuses during important video conferences or online meetings

Quiet Click Rechargeable Mouse - With built-in rechargeable battery which means you can use this mouse without running the risk of not having a couple of batteries at hand. Responsive buttons provides very soft click with less noise, so you won't disturb others while using this mouse

Universal Compatibility - This mouse boasts of an impressive wide compatibility range due to its ability to connect wirelessly via both Bluetooth (whithout the receiver) and 2.4G technology(with the receiver). It is designed to seamlessly work with virtually all Bluetooth-enabled devices or those equipped with USB ports

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Bluetooth Mouse and Jiggler 2 in 1, Multi-Device Bluetooth Mouse, Light Up Mouse

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Please kindly note the following before placing orders for this mouse: 1. The mouse can connect to a maximum of three devices using Bluetooth1/Bluetooth2 (without the adapter) and 2.4G Wireless (with the USB adapter). Please consult the user manual for instructions on how to establish the connections before using it; 2. This mouse has a built-in Mouse Jiggler feature. In "Mouse Jiggler" mode, you can control the mouse cursor as you normally would. However, if there is no movement of the mouse for 5 seconds, it will automatically switch back to the jiggler mode. This ensures that your PC remains active even if the mouse enters deep sleep mode. To exit this mode, simply press and hold the control button for 3-5 seconds; 3. After 60 seconds of inactivity, the mouse will automatically enter sleep mode, causing the LED backlight to turn off. To wake it up, simply click any button on the mouse. In case of 15 minutes of inactivity, the mouse will go into deep sleep mode, and all LED indicators will turn off. Once again, clicking any button will wake it up from deep sleep mode; 4. The backward and forward button is not fully compatible with Mac OS. If you experience mouse lag or the backlit turns off automatically, it may indicate low battery. Please recharge the mouse with the charging cable included in package.
How to Turn On/Off the RGB Backlight

Multi-Device Bluetooth Mouse & Jiggler 2 in 1 This mouse offers a combination of convenience and functionality. It can be used as a regular rechargeable light-up mouse. Additionally, it has a unique mouse jiggler feature. When activated, the mouse will automatically move the cursor to prevent screen timeout when you need to step away Multi-Device Connection for Seamless Multitasking This mouse offers seamless connectivity to up to three devices. It can be connected to devices using 2.4G wireless with the USB dongle, as well as Bluetooth1/Bluetooth2 without the need for the dongle. The switch button is located on the bottom of the mouse, just 1 click for effortless switching

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best item to have when you work at home.
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse. It does everything I need it to do. Keeps all my windows open and I dont have to go back and open them all the time when I step away from the computer. Wish I had known about this sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am Very happy with this Mouse, Bought for the jiggler. I work remotely like so many do these days, and the page times out so fast, Press and holding the turn knob, to turn it on and off. It can be plugged in using the cable, Blue toothed or the little square to the laptop, is awesome. I have been using it for about two months now, and would definitely recommend to anyone, that needs a new Mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good option for cheapo League players who prefer smaller mice
reviews.reviewText: While the lavender color may be a little polarizing, there’s a lot to unanimously like about this economy mouse from Seenda. Built-in USB-C charging port in the front with lighting indication is convenient. The rolling RGB backlight illuminating the base, while pretty, can get old after a while even with its 22 different modes and luckily that can be easily disabled with a dedicated button at the top. It can run either using the supplied USB-A dongle, or Bluetooth, or 2.4G for flexibility in connection. Click action is nice with a muted noise level but the side browser buttons weren’t able to be activated on machines running Mac OS. The jiggler function only has one mode and it’s not likely any office environment will take kindly to that being used as the pace in which it makes the cursor fly around is so fast that it’s too obvious for anything except WFH use. The form factor is nice for someone who likes a mouse with a smaller footprint but I found the scalloping of the side gripping area to not have enough dish to comfortably lift off the surface. Combined this ergonomic miss with weight placement that is a bit too far backward means using it in practice is a bit awkward. As for anyone looking to get this for gaming, note that it doesn’t have fine scrolling or tracking adjustment and the resolution may be a hinder in some situations. It’s also neither a claw grip or a palm grip type of mouse but having said all this, we’re talking about a fairly full-featured all-purpose mouse for under $20 here so it generally works for the role it’s intended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent wireless traditional mouse with a jiggle!
reviews.reviewText: I’m a little bit old fashioned when it comes to mice! I like the look and feel of the original mouse when it used to have a long plugged in USB tail.This affordable alternative wireless mouse does everything it’s supposed to with a simple and easy set up.I like the jiggle feature that helps prevent my screen from locking up with inactivity.The feel of it in my hand is the best part for me. I have a smaller hand and this one feels very natural for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Supports 3 devices but jiggler feature is not the best implementation.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it because of 3 device support and that part is great but for my work laptop it won't do because it's very erratic and jurkey during use e.g. if you move the mouse horizontally from side to side, it randomly moves the pointer vertically as well and with quite a distance and also skips and jumps. This while connected through the provided usb dongle which is supposed to be more stable generally.Will most probably return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mouse and more
reviews.reviewText: This is a really neat mouse with some unique features. First of all it will pair to your computer or tablet by Bluetooth. It will pair to a total of three things at once, I think that will be very useful and space saving. It also has a dongle that plugs in to a USB port. I usually like the dongle type better that Bluetooth because the dongle uses RF which doesn't seem to lag so much but this mouse is goo don either system. It also has a light show that looks really neat and changes color. I haven't tried adjusting that yet but surely you can. It also has a mouse jiggler built in. It appears to load up to my computer as a standard mouse, but it also has the ability to keep your computer awake by moving the mouse around on its own.I'm using the mouse now and it does really well. I was questionable at first because in the location that my thumb sits are two buttons. I was inadvertently pressing one of the buttons and navigating away from the screen I was on. I am used to it now after just a few hours. I was probably accustomed to it after the first five minutes - but it is a little different.It charges with USB type C which is super convenient these days. Battery life seems good so far but I haven't had it on for too long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent little wireless mouse
reviews.reviewText: This mouse is cute, affordable, and great quality. The clicking noise is incredibly minimal, and the color and lights are super cute. The light color is changeable, the battery lasts very long, and my favorite part is that you can either use it via bluetooth or with the USB port. The USB had a nifty storage mechanism that keeps it secure and out of the way when not using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s cute and connected easily but it’s constantly disconnecting and I have to wait for it to respond. Find another option.
